entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a character who doesn't like to tell Mrs. Weasley that Muggle taxi drivers rarely transported overexcited owls.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is an owl that is making an earsplitting racket.

entities.name: filibuster's fabulous wet-start no-heat fireworks
entities.description: Filibuster's Fabulous Wet-Start, No-Heat Fireworks are mentioned as going off unexpectedly when Fred's trunk sprang open.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is a cat that clawed its way up the driver's leg.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as having his trunk spring open.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the characters who are jammed in the back of the taxis with their trunks.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the characters who are jammed in the back of the taxis with their trunks.

relationships.description: Harry owns Pigwidgeon, as mentioned in the text.
Fred has Filibuster's Fabulous Wet-Start, No-Heat Fireworks in his trunk.
Crookshanks attacks the driver by clawing its way up the man's leg.
Ron and Hermione are traveling together in the back of the taxis.
